mainSteps.name: dcsInstanceIds
mainSteps.description: This step grabs the Instance IDs for both nodes that will be configured as DCs in the Quick Start and Instance IDs for the for next steps.

mainSteps.name: dcsInstallDscModules
mainSteps.description: Installs needed Powershell DSC Modules and components on both nodes.

mainSteps.name: dcsLCMConfig
mainSteps.description: Configures Local Configuration Manager on each of the nodes.

mainSteps.name: dc1InstanceId
mainSteps.description: This step grabs the Instance ID for the node that will be configured as the first DC in the new domain.

mainSteps.name: createDC1Mof
mainSteps.description: Generates MOF file on first DC Node to be processed by LCM.

mainSteps.name: configDC1
mainSteps.description: Kicks off DSC Configuration and loopseboots until Node matches Configuration defined in MOF file.

mainSteps.name: dc2InstanceId
mainSteps.description: This step grabs the Instance ID for the node that will be configured as the second DC in the new domain.

mainSteps.name: createDC2Mof
mainSteps.description: Generates MOF file on second DC Node to be processed by LCM.

mainSteps.name: configDC2
mainSteps.description: Kicks off DSC Configuration and loopseboots until Node matches Configuration defined in MOF file.

mainSteps.name: signalfailure
mainSteps.description: If any steps fails signals CFN of Failure
